articles.title: Reception Given by Palestinian Ambassador
articles.content:
Reception Given by Palestinian Ambassador
Pyongyang, February 26 (KCNA) -- Ismail Ahmed Mohamed Hasan, Palestinian ambassador to the DPRK, hosted a reception at his embassy on Friday on the occasion of the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 Present there on invitation were Yang Hyong Sop, vice-president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, and officials concerned.
					
					 The ambassador said in his speech that Kim Jong Il's revolutionary career is an outstanding example as a state leader possessed of brilliant idea and creative caliber. He devoted himself to the freedom of the country and its people's happiness and the victory of the oppressed people's struggle, the ambassador noted, adding:
					
					 The Korean people are making a fresh leap and innovations in all fields for building socialist economic construction under the leadership of Marshal Kim Jong Un who is leading the all-out advance for building a thriving nation as the successor to the cause of President Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Yang Hyong Sop said that Kim Jong Il made great contributions to firmly defending the country, the nation and the destiny of socialism and ensuring the peace and security in the Korean Peninsula and the rest of the world with his original Songun politics.
					
					 He noted that the service personnel and people of the DPRK would surely build a paradise of the people, a reunified powerful nation on this land as desired by Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il, rallied close around Kim Jong Un.
					
					 He said that the DPRK government and the Korean people would as ever send invariable support and solidarity to the just cause of the Palestinian people for regaining the legitimate national rights.

articles.title: Efforts Paid to Afforestation in DPRK
articles.content:
Efforts Paid to Afforestation in DPRK
Pyongyang, February 26 (KCNA) -- Many achievements have been made in the campaign for forest restoration in the DPRK over the last year.
					 A long-term plan was worked out for afforestation in keeping with natural and geographical conditions of the country.
					
					 A storehouse with a capacity of millions of saplings was built at the Central Nursery under the Ministry of Land and Environment Protection and tens of mother nurseries were moved to areas favorable for sapling cultivation.
					
					 Sapling cultivation was put on a highly scientific, industrial and intensive basis, which led to increased production of saplings by 104 percent.
					
					 Meanwhile, different kinds of tree-planting machines were developed.
					
					 According to Kim Song Jun, vice director-general of the General Bureau of Forest under the Ministry of Land and Environment Protection, this year will witness the development of all nurseries across the country into the ones economizing land and manpower.
					
					 Supreme leader Kim Jong Un indicated tasks and ways to turn all mountains into "treasure mountains" and "gold mountains" in his celebrated work "Let the Entire Party, the Whole Army and All the People Conduct a Vigorous Forest Restoration Campaign to Cover the Mountains of the Country with Green Woods" published on February 26, Juche 104 (2015).

articles.title: 31st Festival of Science and Technology of Pyongyang University of Architecture Held
articles.content:
31st Festival of Science and Technology of Pyongyang University of Architecture Held
Pyongyang, February 26 (KCNA) -- The 31st Festival of Science and Technology of Pyongyang University of Architecture took place from Feb. 24 to 26.
					 The festival brought together teachers, researchers, postgraduate students and students of the university. It was divided into panels of architecture, city management, land and environment protection, construction engineering, construction management, building materials, construction machine and IT.
					
					 It involved presentation, exhibition and exchange of new technologies. 
					
					 More than 130 achievements contributable to building an economic giant and developing the nation's architectural science and technology were presented.

articles.title: Youth Movement Museum Draws Many Visitors
articles.content:
Youth Movement Museum Draws Many Visitors
Pyongyang, February 26 (KCNA) -- The Youth Movement Museum is visited by an endless stream of service personal, people from all walks of life and school youth and children. It was built on the occasion of the 70th anniversary of the founding of the Kim Il Sung Socialist Youth League.
					Nearly 20,000 people have visited the museum in one month since it was opened on Jan. 21, 2016.
					
					 The museum is located in Mangyongdae District, Pyongyang. It serves as a base for ideological education as it tells about the idea of the youth movement of the Workers' Party of Korea and its leadership feats.
					
					 Standing in the main lobby are statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il among school youth and children.
					
					 The rooms are arranged according to the annals of the Korean revolution. Displayed there are photos of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il who performed feats in the development of the Juche-oriented youth movement, historic materials and mementoes.  
					
					 The visit to the museum helps visitors keenly realize that the Korean youth movement is the glorious youth movement of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il which was started and has grown stronger under their care.

articles.title: Meetings of Young Vanguard, Members of Women's Union held
articles.content:
Meetings of Young Vanguard, Members of Women's Union held
Pyongyang, February 26 (KCNA) -- Young vanguard and members of the women's union separately met at the Youth Park Open-Air Theatre and the plaza of the Monument to Party Founding on Friday to vow to thoroughly carry out the tasks set forth in the joint calls made by the Central Committee and the Central Military Commission of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) and become honorable victors in the 70-day campaign of loyalty.
					 Present there were Ri Il Hwan, department director of the C.C., the WPK, officials of the youth league and the women's union, officials concerned, youth and students and members of the union.
					
					 Reporters and speakers said that the 70-day campaign of loyalty is a whole-party, whole-state and all-people general mobilization campaign and all-out death-defying campaign to greet the Seventh Congress of the WPK as the glorious one of victors, and an all-out offensive campaign for hastening the final victory of revolution.
					
					 They expressed their determination to display the heroic mettle of the young vanguard and the Korean women in the on-going all-out offensive, noting that the 70-day campaign is sure to triumph thanks to Marshal Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Mass Rallies Held in Provinces
articles.content:
Mass Rallies Held in Provinces
Pyongyang, February 26 (KCNA) -- Mass rallies of South Phyongan, and North Hamgyong, South Hamgyong and Ryanggang provinces took place on Friday to vow to thoroughly carry out the tasks set forth in the joint calls made by the Central Committee and the Central Military Commission of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) and become honorable victors in the 70-day campaign of loyalty.
					 Present there were officials of local party, power and economic bodies and working people's organizations and officials, working people, youth and students of industrial establishments, farms and universities.
					
					 Reporters and speakers recalled that the WPK initiated the 70-day campaign of loyalty to greet its Seventh Congress with high political enthusiasm and unprecedented labor achievements and dynamically called on the whole party and army and all the people to wage a worthwhile struggle.
					
					 They underscored the need for all sectors and units to perform uninterrupted miracles and feats, holding aloft the self-development-first principle, just as the nuclear developers and space conquerors who made distinguished contributions to exalting the dignity and prestige of Juche Korea on the highest level and the workers of the Sangwon Cement Complex brought joy to the Party Central Committee with the most signal success in production.
					
					 Then followed demonstrations.

articles.title: 70-day Campaign Stimulates Productive Enthusiasm in DPRK
articles.content:
70-day Campaign Stimulates Productive Enthusiasm in DPRK
Pyongyang, February 26 (KCNA) -- The 70-day campaign has begun in the DPRK from February 23 as part of the efforts to greet the 7th Congress of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) with unprecedented labor achievements.
					 In hearty response to the WPK's call for ushering in the heyday of the revolution by working miracles in building a thriving nation, all the people have turned out in the campaign.
					
					 Economic officials carry on well the organization and direction of production activities on the spot, taking timely measures for accumulating raw materials.
					
					 Officials of the Party and working people's organizations have encouraged workers and technicians to boost production, paying deep attention to improving their working and living conditions.
					
					 A great upsurge has been witnessed in the fields of power, coal, metal and chemical industries and railway transport, including the Kim Chaek Iron and Steel Complex, Hwanghae Iron and Steel Complex and Paektusan Hero Youth Power Station No. 3.

articles.title: Iron Ore Production Goes Up in DPRK
articles.content:
Iron Ore Production Goes Up in DPRK
Pyongyang, February 26 (KCNA) -- The output of iron ore is going up in the DPRK, thanks to the collective innovation movement staged by the miners in response to the Workers' Party of Korea's call for launching a 70-day campaign.
					 Iron ore producers across the country set their production plan higher and have over-fulfilled their daily quota.
					
					 The workers at the Musan Mining Complex are carrying out their daily assignment 120 percent by operating all machines at full capacity. They finished a project for laying long-distance belt conveyer to raise the mucking capacity 1.4 times.
					
					 Increased production is also witnessed at Jaeryong, Unryul and other mines.

articles.title: Premier League Football Matches End
articles.content:
Premier League Football Matches End
Pyongyang, February 26 (KCNA) -- Premier league football matches of the Paektusan Prize Sports Games, which began here on Feb. 1, came to an end on Feb. 25.
					 The Hwaebul Team beat the Sobaeksu Team 1:0 in the men's finals on Feb. 25.
					
					 In the women's event ended on Feb. 21, the Pyongyang Team won the first place with three wins and two draws in five matches and the Amnokgang Team the second.

articles.title: DPRK People Determined to Mercilessly Punish Provokers
articles.content:
DPRK People Determined to Mercilessly Punish Provokers
Pyongyang, February 26 (KCNA) -- The United States and the Park Geun Hye group of traitors have introduced into south Korea huge lethal weapons for a nuclear war in a bid to "bring down" the social system in the DPRK through what is called "beheading operation" targeting its supreme leadership.
					 Their heinous scheme triggered off the surging resentment from among the DPRK people.
					
					 Choe Kwang Il, a worker of the Chollima Steel Complex, told KCNA:
					
					 It is the mettle of the DPRK workers to mercilessly punish anyone who dare provoke our dignified supreme leadership.
					
					 All the workers of the complex will work feats each day of the 70-day campaign in the spirit of deterring the reckless war moves of the enemies and thus display the dignity of the great Paektusan nation.
					
					 Jong Kwang Myong, an officer of the Korean People's Army said:
					
					 We can never pardon those hooligans of a gangster-like nation, the American cannibals.
					
					 The U.S., engrossed only in aggression, plunder and domination over other nations, and the Park Geun Hye group of traitors following it are the chief criminals bringing a nuclear holocaust to the Korean Peninsula, and they are cancer-like entity that should be removed from the earth.
					
					 The DPRK revolutionary armed forces will reduce to ashes the evil dens of the enemies with tremendous ultra-modern strike means and sweep away those disturbers of peace on this planet.
					
					 O Hyang Mi, a student of Pyongyang University of Architecture, said:
					
					 There is no room in the earth for the U.S. and south Korean puppet forces seeking to get the sun eclipsed by their palms.
					
					 The provokers will face the most miserable punishment that has never been seen in the world.

articles.title: Social Science Seminar Marks 80th Anniversary of Nanhutou Meeting
articles.content:
Social Science Seminar Marks 80th Anniversary of Nanhutou Meeting
Pyongyang, February 26 (KCNA) -- There took place a social science seminar at the Academy of Social Sciences on Friday on the 80th anniversary of the historic Nanhutou meeting guided by President Kim Il Sung.
					 Present at the seminar were Ri Hye Jong, president of the Academy of Social Sciences, officials concerned and teachers, researchers, lecturers and journalists in the fields of science, education, media, preservation of revolutionary relics and party cadre training institutions.
					
					 They heard the papers clarifying the historical position of the Nanhutou meeting in the Korean revolution and giving a scientific and theoretical explanation about the fact that firmly upholding and carrying forward the anti-Japanese revolutionary traditions provides a sure guarantee for accomplishing the revolutionary cause of Juche started in Mt. Paektu.
					
					 The speakers referred to the nature and significance of the meeting of military and political cadres of the Korean People's Revolutionary Army Kim Il Sung convened in Nanhutou in February, Juche 25 (1936).
					
					 They said the meeting set forth a strategic policy on letting the Korean People's Revolutionary Army advance to the border areas and gradually extending the theatre of struggle to the homeland, indicating the way of bringing earlier the cause of national liberation by the concerted efforts of the Korean people.
					
					 The meeting adopted a decision on forming a pan-national united front, thus providing a sure guarantee for the development of the movement to form the anti-Japanese national united front throughout the country and nation with the advance of the armed struggle into the homeland and for the party's leadership and Kim Il Sung's unitary leadership over the movement, they noted.
					
					 They said that the meeting brought about an epochal change in realizing the cause of founding the Juche-type revolutionary party.
					
					 They noted that upholding and successfully carrying forward the revolutionary traditions provide a sure guarantee for remaining true to the party's Songun leadership.

articles.title: Historic Nanhutou Meeting
articles.content:
Historic Nanhutou Meeting
Pyongyang, February 26 (KCNA) -- Eighty years has passed since the Nanhutou Meeting was convened by President Kim Il Sung. The meeting marked a new milestone in developing the overall Korean revolution centered on the anti-Japanese armed struggle onto a higher stage.
					 At that time, the Japanese imperialists were hell-bent on obliterating the Korean people's consciousness of independence and national characters, while hastening their preparation for invading mainland China.
					
					 To cope with the situation, the President convened the Meeting of Military and Political Cadres of the Korean People's Revolutionary Army (KPRA) in Nanhutou of Ningan County, China from February 27 to March 3, Juche 25 (1936) and delivered a report "The Tasks of Communists in the Strengthening and Development of the Anti-Japanese National Liberation Struggle".
					
					 In the report, he set forth strategic policies to transfer the main force of the KPRA to the border point and the area around Mt. Paektu and gradually extend the armed struggle into the homeland, expand the movement of the anti-Japanese national united front and step up moves to found a party. The policies run through the independent stand that the Korean revolutionaries should always be loyal to the Korean revolution.
					
					 Now the army and people of the DPRK, armed with the Juche idea, are going on a general offensive for the final victory of Songun (military-first) revolution under the guidance of supreme leader Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Officials of Chongryon Meet
articles.content:
Officials of Chongryon Meet
Tokyo, February 25 (KNS-KCNA) -- A joint meeting for defending and further developing national education by directing great efforts to national education in 2016 took place at the Korean Hall in Tokyo on Tuesday.
					 The meeting discussed the issues of thoroughly carrying out the instruction given by Marshal Kim Jong Un in his New Year message to channel great efforts into national education and arousing the whole organization and all compatriots to turn out as one in the struggle to defend and further develop national education this year marking the 70th anniversary of the enforcement of the secondary education and the 60th founding anniversary of Korean University.
					
					 Ho Jong Man, chairman of the Central Standing Committee of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon), said in his speech that the Japanese authorities are desperately working to disturb national education, directing the spearhead of suppression of Chongryon to it, underscoring the need to decisively stand up against the moves of the reactionaries inside and outside Japan to discriminate against the Korean schools through a movement for supporting them with the efforts of broad strata of Koreans.
					
					 A meeting of principals of schools at all levels took place at the hall on Wednesday.

articles.title: Park Geun Hye Regime's Three Years of Office Termed Total Failure
articles.content:
Park Geun Hye Regime's Three Years of Office Termed Total Failure
Pyongyang, February 26 (KCNA) -- Lawmakers from the south Korean opposition parties held a press conference in Seoul on Feb. 23 to censure three years' office of the Park Geun Hye regime, according to south Korean CBS. 
					 They noted the unemployment of the young people has worsened and the people's living and economy have been thrown into crises since the emergence of the Park regime.
					
					 They termed the present regime's office a total failure for which Park Geun Hye is to blame.

articles.title: Miserable Human Rights Situation in U.S. and Western Countries Disclosed (2)
articles.content:
Miserable Human Rights Situation in U.S. and Western Countries Disclosed (2)
Pyongyang, February 26 (KCNA) -- The DPRK Association for Human Rights Studies in an indictment issued on Feb. 23 disclosed that the U.S. and western countries wantonly violated rights of the peoples of other countries under the signboard of "human rights" and "democracy."
					 According to it, the U.S. set up "cultural centers" and "information services" in more than a hundred countries of the world to systematically provide them with periodicals spreading the reactionary idea and American-style way of life.
					
					 Radio Free Asia set up in January, 1994 has broadcast in various national languages for 15 hours every day, 80 percent of its programs are aimed at spreading Yankee-style culture and slinging mud at the ideologies and culture of other countries.
					
					 Some countries of the EU and Japan have massively produced and spread reactionary publications slandering the ideologies and social systems of other countries and benumbing the sound thinking of people.
					
					 The U.S. and western countries put under their control the majority of international information exchange after seizing the three fourths of the world websites. They are making desperate efforts to quell the voices representing progress and justice and embellish their unpopular social system against human rights.
					
					 They prodded dissident forces in relevant countries into fostering social confusion and chaos and put pressure on their governments for taking actions against them under the pretext of "human rights abuses." In the long run, they staged military intervention in sovereign countries under the excuse of "protection of human rights."
					
					 The U.S. had committed over 900 cases of operations for assassination and terror against prominent political figures and leading government officials of various countries from 1961 to 1976.
					
					 Its scenario to overturn the regimes of sovereign states still goes on in such anti-imperialist independent countries as Bolivia, Venezuela and Ecuador.
					
					 The U.S. and western countries are wantonly violating international laws adopted to prevent genocide and punish those involved in it under the signboard of "anti-terrorism war."
					
					 About 14 000-110 000 innocent people died every year from 2001 to 2011 due to the U.S.-led "anti-terrorism war."
					
					 For just 5 years since the U.S. invasion of Iraq in March, 2003, 1 205 000 Iraqi people were killed, a million missing, and nearly half of them are children.
					
					 According to a UN report on February 4, 2012, civilians killed due to GIs' operations for "combating terrorism" in Afghanistan numbered 3 021 in 2011 alone. 484 innocent civilians including 168 children were killed by GIs' attacks in Pakistan from 2004 to June, 2012.
					
					 U.S. forces mounted attacks on dwelling houses, hospitals and storehouses of RC organizations, high-voltage cable for cities, etc., which are banned even in wartime by international law, destroying and plundering them.
					
					 GIs massively used chemical and germ weapons during the Korean War in the 1950s, massacring innocent Koreans, and used even depleted uranium bombs during the Gulf and Balkan wars in the 1990s.
					
					 They used horrible chemical weapons destroying even human bones, cruelly massacring civilians during the Iraqi War.
					
					 The U.S. and western countries are committing more serious human rights abuses in secret prisons overseas in wanton violation of international law.
					
					 Pursuant to the regulations for operating overseas secret jails set by the U.S. administration 6 days after the September 11 incident, CIA established and operated secret prisons in various parts of the world including Poland, Afghanistan, Iraq and Thailand.
					
					 U.S. Congress in its report on Dec. 9, 2014 opened to public that CIA had resorted to monstrous tortures baffling human imagination against hundreds of prisoners for several years.
					
					 Britain and 20 other western countries offered secret prisons and interrogation centers to CIA, thus closely cooperating with it in tortures.
					
					 According to the British Guardian in October 2013, the U.S. National Security Bureau wiretapped phone messages of 35 foreign heads of state in conspiracy with the White House, Department of State and Pentagon.
					
					 The Washington Post disclosed on December 5, 2013 that the U.S. gathered 5 billion pieces of information about common citizens in various parts of the world by tracking their mobile phones.
					
					 Even western countries were no exception in wiretapping of phone messages.
					
					 According to information, 360 million pieces of phone messages were eavesdropped in Germany, 70 million in France and 46 million in Italy by the U.S.
					
					 The U.S. large-scale phone wire-tapping operations conducted worldwide for the last several decades are, indeed, unpardonable human rights abuses against not only Americans but peoples of other countries.

articles.title: New Korean War Will Lead U.S. to Final Ruin: News Analysis
articles.content:
New Korean War Will Lead U.S. to Final Ruin: News Analysis
Pyongyang, February 26 (KCNA) -- A touch-and-go situation is now prevailing in the Korean Peninsula due to the confrontational hysteria of the U.S. imperialist aggression forces, who have deployed in south Korea their special operation troops from all arms and services.
					 Under this grave situation the Supreme Command of the Korean People's Army announced a crucial statement carrying the fixed will of all servicepersons and civilians in the DPRK to bring the U.S. imperialist aggressors to the final doom.
					
					 The statement turned the whole country all at once into a scene of towering hatred toward the aggressors.
					
					 The Korean army and people are now filled with confidence that a Korean war in the 21st century will lead the U.S. to its final ruin, unlike the war in the past century.
					
					 In 1950 when the Korean War broke out, the DPRK and the U.S. were in sharp contrast in terms of military technical force.
					
					 The former's regular army was two years old and its defense industry was insignificant.
					
					 On the contrary, the U.S. had A-bombs and huge economic potentials.
					
					 Involved in the war, provoked by the U.S., were one third of its ground force, one fifth of the air force and the most of the Pacific Fleet and troops of its 15 satellite countries, south Korean puppet army and remnants of the former Japanese army, more than two million troops in all and huge latest combat equipment.
					
					 However, the army and people of the DPRK true to the order of the Party and the leader shattered to pieces the myth of the "mightiness" of the U.S. imperialism and started it on the downgrade.
					
					 It is a foolish daydream for the U.S. to stifle the DPRK which joined the advanced nuclear weapons states.
					
					 The nuclear war maniacs should be clearly mindful that all the special operation troops and nuclear war means of the U.S. imperialists now in south Korea as well as their military bases for invading the DPRK in the Asia-Pacific region and the U.S. mainland are within the range of the ultra-modern strike means of the Korean People's Army, which does never show mercy to the aggressors.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Calls on All Service Personnel and People to Become Honorable Victors in 70-day Campaign of Loyalty
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Calls on All Service Personnel and People to Become Honorable Victors in 70-day Campaign of Loyalty
Pyongyang, February 26 (KCNA) -- Upon receiving the joint calls made by the Central Committee and the Central Military Commission of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK), all the service personnel and people have launched the 70-day campaign in response to the ardent call of the party, says Rodong Sinmun Friday in an editorial.
					 It goes on:
					
					 It is the strong confidence of the army and people to become honorable victors in the 70-day campaign by achieving the greatest successes and performing the most shining labor feats in the spirit of Mallima provided by the ever-victorious WPK.
					
					 The 70-day campaign is a gigantic struggle to usher in the greatest heyday in building a thriving nation by bringing about fresh miracles and leap forward on all fronts and at all units.
					
					 The campaign calls for creating new standards, records and miracles in every part of the country one after another so that a breakthrough is made in the sacred advance for opening up the greatest heyday of building a thriving nation. Herein lies our party's major intention of calling for the campaign.
					
					 Let us become honorable victors in the 70-day campaign of loyalty. This is the requirement of the party and the revolution and the intention of the era.
					
					 All the party members, service personnel and people should glorify every day to be honorable and proud before the party, the revolution and the country, wholeheartedly responding to the call of the party for the 70-day campaign.
					
					 The editorial calls on all Koreans to dash forward along the road of the Korean revolution indicated by the party in the spirit of the blizzards of Paektu and thus demonstrate the honor of victors in the 70-day campaign.

articles.title: Organization of Disabled in S. Korea Demands Guarantee of Human Rights
articles.content:
Organization of Disabled in S. Korea Demands Guarantee of Human Rights
Pyongyang, February 26 (KCNA) -- The Solidarity for Abolition of Discrimination against the Disabled for General Elections of south Korea, which groups over 150 organizations of the disabled, demanded the guarantee of human rights at the news conference in Seoul on Feb. 23 according to MBC of south Korea.
					 The organization denounced "the government" and local autonomous bodies for shunning the issue of providing living conditions to the disabled.
					
					 It stressed that every political party and candidate should make commitments to institute a law in favor of human rights of the disabled and shape a budget for their welfare in the coming general election.
					
					 It demanded that they be given the right to vote, in particular.

articles.title: U.S. and S. Korea's Moves for Beefing up Aggressor Armed Forces under Fire
articles.content:
U.S. and S. Korea's Moves for Beefing up Aggressor Armed Forces under Fire
Pyongyang, February 26 (KCNA) -- The People for Achieving Peace and Reunification of south Korea Tuesday held the 166th rally for peace and disarmament to denounce the U.S. and south Korean puppet warmongers' moves for a war of aggression against the north.
					 At the rally the organization accused the Ministry of Defence of floating misinformation about the deployment of THAAD to south Korea and disclosed its injustice.
					
					 The projected deployment of THAAD will result from threatening peace and security in the Korean Peninsula and doing harm to the interests of the people in the south, the organization charged.
					
					 It demanded the authorities stop the negotiations with the U.S. for deploying THAAD and the military racket against the north.

articles.title: Leading Newspapers Warn U.S., S. Korean Warmongers of Severe Punishment
articles.content:
Leading Newspapers Warn U.S., S. Korean Warmongers of Severe Punishment
Pyongyang, February 26 (KCNA) -- Leading newspapers here on Friday rap the U.S. and south Korean warmongers for running wild to hurt the dignity of the DPRK's supreme leadership.
					 Rodong Sinmun says in an article the Korean nation keenly feels once again the need to wipe out to the last man the U.S. imperialists and south Korean traitors keen to provoke a nuclear war against the DPRK in order to ensure durable peace in the Korean Peninsula and reunify the country under the prevailing grave situation.
					
					 It is ridiculous for the south Korean warmongers to kick up war hysteria against the DPRK in collusion with the U.S. and desperately work to make the sun sink, crying out for "beheading operation."
					
					 The south Korean puppet forces should clearly know that the U.S. nuclear weapons and other ultra-modern military hardware on which they pin so strong hope would prove ineffective in face of the merciless strike of the powerful revolutionary Paektusan army.
					
					 Looking back on history, the DPRK has a glorious tradition of inflicting a disgraceful defeat upon the U.S. imperialists and decisively shattering all their moves though they were over-confident of its increased muscle.
					
					 No matter how desperately the south Korean puppet forces may work, they can never get rid of the bottomless abyss of final doom.
					
					 If they provoke a war of aggression in league with the U.S. despite the unanimous censure and condemnation of all Koreans, they will be wiped out to the last man.
					
					 Minju Joson says in a commentary that if the U.S. imperialists and south Korean warmongers persistently go reckless, all the service personnel and people of the DPRK will mete out a severest punishment to them so that they may regret even after death the thrice-cursed criminal act of having pointed an accusing finger at the sun.

articles.title: Japanese Reactionaries' Suppression of Chongryon Denounced
articles.content:
Japanese Reactionaries' Suppression of Chongryon Denounced
Pyongyang, February 26 (KCNA) -- Days ago the National Police Agency of Japan hurled a joint investigation headquarters police team including the police headquarters of Kyoto, Kanagawa, Yamaguchi and Shimane prefectures to search offices of economic bodies under the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon) such as the Federation of Joint Economic Venture of Korean Residents in Japan under the pretence of violation of "law on foreign exchange" by a Korean trading company.
					 Minju Joson Friday says in a commentary in this regard:
					
					 This is another unpardonable, grave politically- motivated provocation against the DPRK and Chongryon as it was illegal gangsterism.
					
					 The recent forcible search was politically-motivated grave terrorism to infringe upon the sovereignty of the DPRK, harshly suppress the officials of Chongryon and Koreans in Japan and stifle Chongryon at any cost.
					
					 It is the well-known fact that the Japanese reactionaries slapped unreasonable independent sanctions against the DPRK under the pretext of the launch of earth observation satellite, an exercise of a legitimate and independent right of a sovereign state. The recent search operations are, in essence, part of the anti-DPRK, anti-Chongryon sanctions by the Japanese reactionaries. They are despicable and inhumane violation of human rights to suppress Chongryon and Koreans in Japan by creating uneasiness and fear in the Korean community and inciting hostility toward the DPRK and Chongryon among the Japanese people. At the same time, it is the revelation of the black-hearted scenario to realize the ambition for reinvading the DPRK at any cost by driving the DPRK-Japan relations to catastrophe and tightening the military nexus with the U.S. and south Korean puppet group.
					
					 The Japanese reactionaries should clearly understand that nothing can infringe upon the sovereignty of the DPRK and stamp out Chongryon.
					
					 A saying goes every sin brings its punishment with it. If the Japanese reactionaries persistently resort to suppression of Chongryon, they will be wholly responsible for the ensuing serious consequences.

articles.title: Kimjongilia Exhibitions Held in China
articles.content:
Kimjongilia Exhibitions Held in China
Pyongyang, February 26 (KCNA) -- Kimjongilia exhibitions were held by companies in Dalian and Shenyang cities of China from Feb. 11 to 16 on the occasion of the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 Displayed at the venues of the exhibitions were more than 1 000 potted Kimjongilias with a huge panel depicting Kimjongilia, Jong Il Peak, Kim Jong Il's birthplace in the Paektusan Secret Camp, Lake Chon on Mt. Paektu and Star of Generalissimo in the background.
					
					 Present at the opening ceremonies of the exhibitions were public figures and people of Dalian City and Shenyang City and staff members of the DPRK missions there.
					
					 Meanwhile, a Korean photo, book, stamp and fine art exhibition took place in Dandong City, China from Feb. 1 to 18.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Birth Anniversary Observed by Russian Newspaper
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Birth Anniversary Observed by Russian Newspaper
Pyongyang, February 26 (KCNA) -- The sixth issue of the Russian newspaper Zavtra carried an article titled "Comrade Kim Jong Il's birth anniversary is national holiday of DPRK" illustrated with his picture, contributed by writer Rabrentsi Gurzhiev.
					 The newspaper noted that Kim Jong Il's life brightly indicated the century of the future beyond the 20th century and the 21st century.
					
					 He gave the Korean people firm steadfastness, published many works on the building of socialism and pursued the original Songun politics, it said.
					
					 He always emerged victorious in the political and military confrontation with the imperialists, it noted.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Work Posted on Website by British Organization
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Work Posted on Website by British Organization
Pyongyang, February 26 (KCNA) -- Leader Kim Jong Il's work "The Songun-based Revolutionary Line Is a Great Revolutionary Line of Our Era and an Ever-Victorious Banner of Our Revolution" was posted by the British Association for the Study of Songun Policy on its website on January 27.
					 The work, published on January 29, Juche 92 (2003), clarifies the idea that the Songun-based revolutionary line, the Songun politics of the Workers' Party of Korea, is an effective political mode in the present era that has carried forward and developed President Kim Il Sung's idea and line on attaching importance to the army, and a scientific and revolutionary line and political mode most correctly meeting the requirements of the times and the revolution.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Work Published in Slovenia
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Work Published in Slovenia
Pyongyang, February 26 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un's work "Become Pillars Supporting a Prosperous Future Korea" was brought out in booklet by the Slovenian preparatory committee for celebrating the Day of the Sun and the Day of the Shining Star (the birth anniversaries of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il) on February 18.
					 Kim Jong Un made a congratulatory speech at the joint national meeting of the Korean Children's Union (KCU) organizations on June 6, Juche 101 (2012) in celebration of the 66th founding anniversary of the KCU. In the speech he expressed his firm will to invariably carry forward the noble outlook of the great Generalissimos Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il on the future and the rising generation.
					
					 He also indicated the tasks and ways to bring up the KCU members as knowledgeable, virtuous and healthy reserve forces to be responsible for the future destiny of the country and the nation.

articles.title: DPRK's Satellite Launch Hailed by Chilean, Indian Organizations
articles.content:
DPRK's Satellite Launch Hailed by Chilean, Indian Organizations
Pyongyang, February 26 (KCNA) -- Chilean and Indian organizations released statements on Feb. 8 hailing the DPRK's successful launch of earth observation satellite Kwangmyongsong-4.
					 The Chilean branch of the Korean Friendship Association stated:
					
					 The DPRK's successful satellite launch is an exercise of the sovereign right of the Korean people to develop the science and technology of the country.
					
					 Nobody can restrain a sovereign state from developing science and technology.
					
					 We fully support the DPRK's satellite launch for the national development and well-being of the people, defying the challenges and disturbances by the hostile forces.
					
					 The All India Indo-Korean Friendship Association said the successful launch of Kwangmyongsong-4 is the brilliant fruition of the DPRK's policy of attaching importance to science and technology.
					
					 It is also another great success of the Korean people's struggle to lead a more civilized life by developing science, technology and economy, the association noted, adding that to use space for peaceful purposes is the legitimate right of a sovereign state.

articles.title: S. Korean Hostile Policy toward DPRK Condemned in UK
articles.content:
S. Korean Hostile Policy toward DPRK Condemned in UK
Pyongyang, February 26 (KCNA) -- A mass rally and a demonstration took place in front of the south Korean puppet embassy in London on February 4, supporting the independent and peaceful reunification in the Korean Peninsula and denouncing the south Korean authorities for pursuing hostile policy toward the DPRK and unpopular policy.
					 Present there were figures of the New Communist Party of Britain, the Korean Friendship Association UK, the British Group for the Study of the Juche Idea and the British Association for the Study of Songun Policy and other people.
					
					 Dermot Hudson, chairman of the British Association for the Study of Songun Policy, supported the DPRK's proposal for independent and peaceful reunification.
					
					 He went on:
					
					 There is no independence in south Korea and tens of thousands of U.S. troops are present there.
					
					 The kingpin of abusing human rights in the Korean Peninsula is none other than the south Korean puppet regime.
					
					 It is clumsy that the south Korean puppet forces are running amuck in hysteria while taking issue with the DPRK's satellite launch for peaceful purposes.
					
					 The DPRK has a right to launch its satellite and this admits of no argument.
					
					 Andy Brooks, general secretary of the Central Committee of the New Communist Party of Britain, condemned the human rights abuses in south Korea.
					
					 A statement was read out.
					
					 After the meeting the participants waged a demonstration and distributed information leaflets to pedestrians, shouting slogans including "Korea is one!" and "U.S. forces, Go out of south Korea!"

articles.title: Seminars Held in Mongolia, Indonesia, Poland
articles.content:
Seminars Held in Mongolia, Indonesia, Poland
Pyongyang, February 26 (KCNA) -- There took place seminars in Mongolia, Indonesia and Poland from Feb. 5 to 16 on the occasion of the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il (the Day of the Shining Star).
					 Ch. Bayarbat, executive chairman of the Mongolian Centre for the Study of Juche, made the following speech:
					
					 HE Kim Jong Il established the Songun political mode.
					
					 He pursued Songun politics to bolster up the defence capabilities though the imperialist allied forces got more projected in their moves to stifle the DPRK when socialism collapsed in some countries in the late 20th century.
					
					 His Songun politics is the ever-victorious banner that helps defend and glorify the sovereignty of the country and the nation.
					
					 Miracles are worked one after another in the DPRK thanks to his far-sighted wisdom guided by the Juche idea and Songun idea fathered by President Kim Il Sung in the revolution and construction.

articles.title: Tienen lugar mitines multitudinarios provinciales
articles.content:
Tienen lugar mitines multitudinarios provinciales
Pyongyang, 26 de febrero (ACNC) -- Tuvieron lugar el dia 26 respectivamente en las provincias de Phyong-an del Sur,  Hamgyong del Norte, Hamgyong del Sur y Ryanggang los mitines multitudinarios para materializar cabalmente las tareas presentadas en las consignas conjuntas del Comite Central y la Comision Militar Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y hacerse dignos triunfadores en la campana de fidelidad de 70 dias.
					Estuvieron presentes los funcionarios de los organismos locales del partido, el poder y la economia, entidades de masas, fabricas, empresas, granjas, universidades, etc., los trabajadores, jovenes y estudiantes de respectivas localidades.
					
					En las ocasiones hubo informes y discursos de los representantes de clase obrera, trabajadores agricolas, jovenes y funcionarios.
					
					Los oradores mencionaron que el PTC tuvo la iniciativa de la campana de fidelidad de 70 dias para celebrar el VII Congreso del PTC con elevado entusiasmo politico y exitos laborales sin precedentes y llama a todo el Partido, todo el ejercito y todo el pueblo a esta campana digna.
					
					Exhortaron a todos los dominios y unidades a crear sucesivos milagros y meritos manteniendo el espiritu de dar primacia al autofortalecimiento como los desarrolladores nucleares y conquistadores espaciales que hicieron aporte especial a demostrar en maximo nivel la dignidad y autoridad de la Corea jucheana, y como los obreros del Complejo de Cemento de Sangwon que dieron alegria al Comite Central del Partido con el aumento de produccion sin precedente. 
					
					Actos seguido, hubo manifestaciones multitudinarias.

articles.title: Tienen lugar actos de juramento de jovenes y miembros de UMDC
articles.content:
Tienen lugar actos de juramento de jovenes y miembros de UMDC
Pyongyang, 26 de febrero (ACNC) -- Tuvieron lugar el dia 26, respectivamente en el Anfiteatro del Parque Juventud y la explanada del Monumento a la Fundacion del Partido los actos de juramento de las vanguardias juveniles y las miembros de la Union de Mujeres Democraticas de Corea para materializar cabalmente las tareas presentadas en las consignas conjuntas del Comite Central y la Comision Militar Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y hacerse dignos triunfadores en la campana de 70 dias de fidelidad.
					En las ocasiones, estuvieron presentes Ri Il Hwan, jefe de departamento del Comite Central del PTC, funcionarios de la Union de la Juventud Socialista Kim Il Sung, la UMDC y la rama interesada, jovenes, estudiantes y miembros de la UMDC.
					
					En los actos hubo informes y discursos.
					
					Los oradores subrayaron que la campana de 70 dias es la lucha de movilizacion general de todo el Partido, el Estado y el pueblo para glorificar el Septimo Congreso del PTC como gran reunion gloriosa de los triunfadores y la ofensiva general para adelantar la victoria final de la revolucion.
					
					Ellos senalaron que la victoria de la campana es definitiva gracias al Mariscal Kim Jong Un y expresaron su decision de manifestar en esta campana el espiritu heroico de las vanguardias juveniles y las mujeres coreanas.

articles.title: AEDHC revela miserable situacion de DDHH de EE.UU. y Occidente (2)
articles.content:
AEDHC revela miserable situacion de DDHH de EE.UU. y Occidente (2)
Pyongyang, 26 de febrero (ACNC) -- En el acta de acusacion publicado el dia 23, la Asociacion de Estudio de Derechos Humanos de Corea (AEDHC) revelo que EE.UU. y otros paises occidentales pisotean despiadadamente los derechos humanos de los pueblos de otros paises bajo el cartel de "DDHH" y "democracia". 
					Segun el documento, EE.UU. tiene establecidos en mas de 100 paises los "institutos culturales" y "los de informacion" e introducen sistematicamente las publicaciones llenas de la idea reaccionaria y el modo de vida al estilo norteamericano.
					
					La Radio Asia Libre fundada en enero de 1994 transmite en diferentes idiomas durante 15 horas cada dia. El 80% de su contenido se dirige a divulgar la cultura al estilo yanqui y censurar la ideologia y cultura de otros paises. 
					
					Algunos miembros de la Union Europea, Japon y otros paises tambien divulgan en gran escala las publicaciones reaccionarias que calumnian la ideologia y regimen de otros paises y adormecen la sana conciencia ideologica de los seres humanos. 
					
					EE.UU. y Europa Occidental controlan tres cuartas partes de las infraestructuras de Internet y la mayoria del intercambio internacional de informacion y se entregan a reprimir las voces de progreso y justicia y embellecen el regimen social antipopular y de lesa humanidad de si mismos. 
					
					Crean el disturbio social en otros paises instigando a las fuerzas antigubernamentales de respectivos paises y ejercen la presion calificando la protesta a sus maniobras de "represion de DDHH", y a la larga, cometen la intervencion militar so pretexto de la "defensa de DDHH". 
					
					Desde 1961 hasta 1976, EE.UU. perpetro mas de 900 operaciones terroristas y de asesinato cauteloso contra los politicos celebres y funcionarios importantes de gobiernos extranjeros. 
					
					El complot de EE.UU. para derrocar los gobiernos de Estados soberanos continua todavia en Bolivia, Venezuela, Ecuador y otros paises independientes y antiimperialistas. 
					
					Bajo el rotulo de "antiterrorismo", EE.UU. y los paises occidentales infringen brutalmente los derechos internacionales aprobados a fin de prevenir y castigar las matanzas. 
					
					En el periodo de 2001 a 2011 fueron asesinados cada ano 14 mil o 110 mil personas inocentes en la "guerra antiterrorista" conducida por EE.UU. 
					
					Durante 5 anos despues de la invasion armada de EE.UU. contra Iraq cometida en marzo de 2003, quedaron muertos mas de un millon 205 mil iraquies y desaparecidos un millon. Y la mitad de ellos fueron los ninos. 
					
					Segun el informe de la ONU, publicado el 4 de febrero de 2012, solo en el ano 2011 resultaron muertos 3 mil 21 civiles afganos en la "guerra antiterrorista" de EE.UU. 
					
					Desde 2004 hasta junio de 2012, en Pakistan, 484 habitantes pacifistas incluso 168 ninos perdieron la vida por los ataques de uniformados norteamericanos. 
					
					Las tropas norteamericanas atacaron, destruyeron y saquearon a sus caprichos las viviendas, hospitales, depositos de entidades de la cruz roja, los cables electricos de alta tension extendidos por las ciudades y otros objetos  prohibidos de ser atacados aun en el tiempo de guerra, en virtud de la ley internacional.
					
					En la decada de los 50 del siglo pasado el imperio americano uso en la guerra coreana las armas quimicas y bacteriologicas dejando como saldo incontables civiles muertos, y en la decada de los 90, uso los proyectiles de uranio empobrecido en las guerras persica y balcanica. 
					
					En la guerra iraqui asesino cruelmente a muchos habitantes inocentes con las armas quimicas que derriten hasta los huesos de seres humanos. 
					
					La violacion de DDHH de EE.UU. y otros paises occidentales se comete mas cinicamente en sus carceles secretas instaladas en el extranjero. 
					
					Segun el reglamento de gestion de carceles secretas en ultramar, aprobado por la administracion norteamericana 6 dias despues del incidente del 11 de septiembre, la Agencia Central de Inteligencia (CIA) establecio y gestiono las carceles secretas en Polonia, Afganistan, Iraq, Tailandia y otras partes de nuestro planeta. 
					
					El Congreso norteamericano, en su informe publicado el 9 de diciembre de 2014, anuncio que durante varios anos la CIA torturo bestialmente a los reos. 
					
					21 paises occidentales incluso Gran Bretana ofrecieron a la CIA las carceles secretas y bases de interrogacion y le brindaron la colaboracion en las torturas. 
					
					Segun el periodico britanico Guardian de octubre de 2013, la Agencia de Seguridad Nacional de EE.UU. intercepto las comunicaciones telefonicas de 35 jefes de Estado en confabulacion con la Casa Blanca, el Departamento de Estado y el Departamento de Defensa. 
					
					El 5 de diciembre de 2013, el periodico estadounidense The Washington Post reporto que EE.UU. recopilo diariamente 5 mil millones de informaciones de moradores de diferentes partes del mundo con el metodo de perseguir el sitio de telefono movil. 
					
					La interceptacion telefonica de EE.UU. no excluye a los paises occidentales.
					
					Segun trascendidos, EE.UU. intercepto mas de 360 millones de comunicaciones telefonicas de Alemania, 70 millones de Francia y 46 millones de Italia. 
					
					La interceptacion telefonica de EE.UU. que se comete siglo tras siglo a escala mundial resulta intolerable crimen que viola los derechos humanos de sus propios habitantes y los demas pueblos del mundo.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun exhorta a todos militares y civiles a ser triunfadores en campana de 70 dias
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun exhorta a todos militares y civiles a ser triunfadores en campana de 70 dias
Pyongyang, 26 de febrero (ACNC) -- Al recibir las consignas conjuntas del Comite Central y la Comision Militar Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, todo el ejercito y todo el pueblo empezaron a desplegar la campana de 70 dias respondiendo al llamamiento del partido.
					Los militares y civiles coreanos estan dispuestos a hacerse triunfadores honrosos en la campana de 70 dias al crear mayores exitos y meritos laborales dando la espuela de saltos al caballo Mallima montado por el PTC.
					
					La campana de 70 dias deviene una lucha gigantesca para abrir la era de mayor esplendor en la construccion de un Estado prospero creando nuevos milagros y dando el salto mas alto en todas las ramas.
					
					El PTC exhorto a desplegar la campana de 70 dias con el proposito de abrir de par en par la brecha de la sagrada marcha hacia la epoca de mayor apogeo de la construccion de un Estado prospero haciendo crear sucesivamente nueva norma, nuevo record y nuevo milagro sin precedentes en todas las partes del pais.
					
					Todos sean triunfadores honrosos en la campana de 70 dias de la fidelidad, esto es la demanda del partido y la revolucion y el proposito de la epoca.
					
					Todos los militantes del partido, los oficiales y soldados del Ejercito Popular y el pueblo deben hacer valer cada dia digna y orgullosamente ante el partido, la revolucion y la patria respondiendo al llamamiento del PTC a la campana de 70 dias.
					
					El articulo exhorta a todos a exaltar el honor de triunfadores en esta campana avanzando a toda vela en direccion a la que sopla el viento cortante del Paektu siguiendo la ruta indicada por la revolucion coreana.

articles.title: Minju Joson rechaza represion anti-Chongryon de Japon
articles.content:
Minju Joson rechaza represion anti-Chongryon de Japon
Pyongyang, 26 de febrero (ACNC) -- Hace poco, la Agencia Nacional de Policia de Japon lanzo al destacamento de policia del grupo de investigacion conjunta compuesto por las estaciones policiacas de la prefectura de Kyoto y de los departamentos de Kanagawa, Yamakuchi y Shimane a pesquisar a fuerza las oficinas de entidades economicas de la Asociacion General de Coreanos Residentes en Japon (Chongryon) incluso la Federacion de Intercambio de Economia Asociada de Coreanos Residentes en Japon.
					En un comentario individual de este viernes, el periodico Minju Joson lo califica de crimen gangsteril carente de fundamento legal y de intolerable provocacion politica contra la RPDC y la Chongryon, y prosigue:
					
					El presente caso resulta un grave terror politico destinado a violar la soberania de la RPDC, maltratar a los funcionarios de la Chongryon y los compatriotas residentes en Japon y exterminar a toda costa la Chongryon. 
					
					Ya es conocido por todos el que los reaccionarios japoneses tomaron por separado las injustas medidas de sancion anti-RPDC cuestionando el lanzamiento de satelite de observacion de la Tierra, ejercicio de derecho legitimo e independiente de un Estado soberano. 
					
					La presente pesquisa forzosa, es, en su esencia, la continuacion de la sancion anti-RPDC y anti-Chongryon y la violacion de DDHH tendente a crear el ambiente panico entre los coreanos residentes en Japon e infundir a la poblacion japonesa el sentimiento anti-RPDC y anti-Chongryon para exterminar la Chongryon y los compatriotas residentes en Japon. 
					
					Al mismo tiempo, es la expresion del malsano intento de llevar a la ruptura las relaciones con la RPDC y lograr la ambicion de nueva agresion anti-RPDC mediante el fortalecimiento de la confabulacion militar con EE.UU. y los titeres surcoreanos. 
					
					Los reaccionarios japoneses deben tener presente que no pueden danar de ninguna manera la soberania de la RPDC ni desintegrar la Chongryon. 
					
					Cada cual responde por sus actos. 
					
					Si los reaccionarios japoneses siguen recurriendo a la represion a la Chongryon, la responsabilidad por el respecto recaera enteramente sobre ellos mismos.
